alert.note: Alert for Blair; Cambria (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 12 at 9:10PM EDT until August 12 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: The National Weather Service in State College PA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Blair County in central Pennsylvania... Central Cambria County in central Pennsylvania... * Until 1000 PM EDT. * At 909 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gallitzin, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Altoona, Hollidaysburg, Roaring Spring, Martinsburg, Lakemont, Cresson, Gallitzin, Loretto, Williamsburg, Duncansville, Lilly and Sankertown. Radar has indicated rotation within this severe thunderstorm. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, tornadoes can develop quickly during severe thunderstorms. This includes Interstate 99 from mile markers 22 to 35. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Stay inside a well built structure and keep away from windows. Although a tornado is not immediately likely, they can develop quickly during severe thunderstorms. If you spot a tornado, act quickly and move to a place of safety inside a sturdy structure such as a basement or small interior room. This severe thunderstorm may cause serious injury and significant property damage.
